opponent.label: Sweetheart
opponent.artist: onboro (Model and Posing), cali (Twintails) , thelonelyphonebox (Bodypillow), Insiduani (Posing)
opponent.description: The impulsive and beautiful mad duchess who lives in a big pink castle in Pyrefly Forest, loved by Sprout Moles everywhere. A vain narcissist, with a flair for the dramatic. She is still looking for her one true love.
